page.title: 06Agriculture
page.content: One land rover, one John Deer combine and he has been a farmer all his life. He makes no silage just hay from approx. 100 acres. He grows corn and the workers names are Phillip Sutcliffe and Maurice Fox. 3. Deverill Farm. John Martin owns this farm and he has been a farmer all his life and he has the following vehicles, one J.C.B. one fork lift truck, three John Deer tractors, two muck spreaders and one Land Rover and a combine, he has 400 acres, grows 200 acres of grain which yeilds approx. 3.5 tons to the acre. 170 cows, Friesans producing 6,500 litres per cow per year.
